programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: The residents become concerned about the fight between Jethalal and Champaklal and want to help the two reconcile. Jethalal faints after coming back from work.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Taarak tells Champaklal that Jethalal will not eat anything until Champaklal is the one who takes care of him.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Champaklal gets mad at Jethalal again for booking the wrong train tickets. Taarak and Anjali talk about their lives in Gokuldham.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Jethalal tells Popatlal about Bhide's scooter and Popatlal promises to keep it a secret. Meanwhile, Jethalal contemplates whether to report the missing scooter to the police.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Bhide is furious and wants to know why Jethalal does not report the missing scooter to the police. Later, Jethalal convinces Bhide to consult an ascetic who finds lost items.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Nattu Kaka gets ready to help Jethalal cover up the accident with Bhide's scooter. Iyer is doubtful an ascetic can help.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Nattu Kaka pretends to be Tun Baba, an ascetic who finds lost things. While the Gokuldham residents are amazed by his powers, Taarak notices that Nattu Kaka's fake beard is about to fall.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Bhide finally has his scooter back and apologises to the Tappu Sena for suspecting them. However, Tappu decides to reveal the truth in front of everyone.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Champaklal asks Bhide to punish the kids and Bhide asks Tappu to post his confession on social media. Everyone forgives the Tappu Sena and they enjoy lunch together.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Sonu and Madhvi come back from their trip to see Bhide unusually calm, and Madhvi forces him to tell her everything that happened when she was away.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Jethalal is upset when a childhood photograph of him enjoying mangoes makes the rounds. Bhide visits Gada Electronics to buy a cheap mobile phone.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: The women of Gokuldham society ask Bhide to order mangoes from Ratnagiri. Bhide's new phone has a problem.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: The residents of a housing society help each other find solutions when they face common real-life challenges and get involved in sticky situations.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Bhide is extremely pleased with his idea to deal in mangoes. He orders a great amount of mangoes from Ratnagiri.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Bhide puts up a mango stall in the compound and decides to deliver the fruits to all the residents of Gokuldham Society.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: The women of Gokuldham Society notice that all the mangoes are rotten and decide to complain to Bhide.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Jethalal learns about the rotten mangoes and becomes furious. Bhide struggles to cope with all the complaints from his customers.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Jethalal insults Bhide and Bhau Kaka for selling terrible mangoes. Bhau Kaka arrives with a group of men, demanding to see Jethalal.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Jethalal suspects that Bhau Kaka has arrived to beat him up and grows terrified, but things take a surprising twist when Bhau Kaka reveals his true intentions.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: An absent-minded Jethalal collides with Champklal and apologises profusely. He almost collides with a car as he walks about humming a popular tune.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: An aggressive truck driver threatens Jethalal in front of everyone. Anjali confides in her friends about her fears with regards to the truck driver.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: At the godown, a few truck drivers corner Jethalal and his colleagues. Champaklal is kidnapped when he steps out for a walk.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: The residents of Gokuldham become worried as they are unable to contact Jethalal. Everyone decides to meet at the police station to lodge a complaint.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Jethalal asks Inspector Pandey for help in finding Champaklal, who has been kidnapped. Bagha arrives at the police station with someone.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Bagha brings the truck driver to the police station, after which Chalu Pandey threatens to go home. Jethalal receives a call from an unknown number.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: A worried Jethalal, Chalu Pandey and their friends come up with a brilliant plan that will help them find the car and eventually lead them to the kidnappers.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: After checking the CCTV footage, Jethalal and Chalu Pandey realise that the car has left Mumbai. They set out in search of Champaklal.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Soon after leaving Mumbai, Jethalal and Chalu Pandey get into an accident as their car rams into an obstacle. On finding out about the incident, Inspector Pandey and his team reach the spot of crime.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: At the resort, the residents of Gokuldham split up and search for Champaklal. Jethalal and his friends spot a suspicious waiter.
